text:
From Wikipedia

> Gitter is an instant messaging and chat room system for developers and users of GitHub repositories.

I first encountered it af https://github.com/biosustain/potion, see how the readme on github has a gitter link, I think this project could benefit from a gitter. What do you guys think?
title: Create a gitter.im account for the repo
Create a gitter.im account for the repo

text:
Hi, I will think of it.
Any way you can ask any questions here or on [google groups](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/aio-libs)

I thought about giiter but declined the idea.
IFAIK gitter cannot be coupled to organization.
There is no reason for having separate gitter room for every aio-libs project.
Thus please post your question to aio-libs google group.

I see, thank you for regarding my proposal.

On Thursday, November 26, 2015, Alexey Popravka notifications@github.com
wrote:

> Closed #98 https://github.com/aio-libs/aioredis/issues/98.
> 
> â€”
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
> https://github.com/aio-libs/aioredis/issues/98#event-475395488.
@asvetlov you may consider creating an aio-libs/aio-libs repository which just lists the different projects going on and also has the Gitter.im channel
Yep, but gitter also has some nice integration features like "activity" etc and those are linked to repository (to its issues/comments/pull requests/etc). They would not work for separate repository
